column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////- Cajun Brick Chicken: This was the most perfectly cooked
column4: nicely seasoned chicken I've ever had the pleasure of eating in a restaurant. The chicken was super moist and my boyfriend rated it as "excellent and damn awesome". Honestly
column5: this is my ideal chicken and rice dish. It is a little spicy
column6: but I like a kick to my food.
